org.forgerock.openidm.sync.impl

Class ReconciliationContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openidm.sync.impl.ReconciliationContext

  • public class ReconciliationContext
extends Object
    Represents the information and functionality for a reconciliation run

      • ReconciliationContext

        public ReconciliationContext(ReconciliationService.ReconAction reconAction,
                     org.forgerock.openidm.sync.impl.ObjectMapping mapping,
                     org.forgerock.json.resource.ServerContext callingContext,
                     org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue reconParams,
                     org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue overridingConfig,
                     ReconciliationService service)
                      throws org.forgerock.json.resource.BadRequestException
        Creates the instance with info from the current call context
        Parameters:
        reconAction - the recon action
        mapping - the mapping configuration
        callingContext - The resource call context
        reconParams - configuration options for the recon
        Throws:
        org.forgerock.json.resource.BadRequestException

        Cancel the reconciliation run. May not take immediate effect in stopping the reconciliation logic.

      • isCanceled

        Returns:
        Whether the reconciliation run has been canceled.

      • checkCanceled

        public void checkCanceled()
                   throws SynchronizationException
        Check if a given reconciliation instance has requested to be canceled and throw an exception if it has
        Throws:
        SynchronizationException - if the reconciliation has been aborted

      • getStatistics

        Returns:

        Returns:

        public Map<String,Object> getProgress()
        Returns:
        the populated run progress structure

      • getSourceIds

        public Set<String> getSourceIds()
        Returns:
        the list of all source object ids in the reconciliation scope, queried at the outset of reconciliation. Null if no bulk source id query was done.

      • getTargetIds

        public Set<String> getTargetIds()
        Returns:
        the list of all ids in the target object set, queried at the outset of reconciliation. Null if no bulk target id query was done.

      • setStage

        public void setStage(org.forgerock.openidm.sync.impl.ReconStage newStage)
        Parameters:
        stage - Sets the current state and stage in the reconciliation process

        Returns a summary of the reconciliation run.
